name: Arc by Arc
description:
Arc by Arc is a little puzzle game where you control two balls turning around each other. Made in around 7h30, for the Trijam#135 - Theme: Circles

You control each ball, one after another, by simply giving the direction (clockwise or counter-clockwise) for the next circular movement for the inactive ball. Besides each ball will always orbits around the other one, so you are not free in your movements ! By the way, if a ball collides with a wall, it will restart the level (but the rope between balls doesn't collide)

To finish a level, reach the colored zone. At the moment, there are 8 levels.

Controls (mouse)

  • Left click : Launch the inactive ball counter-clockwise
  • Right click : Launch the inactive ball clockwise

Made By

Louis 'Pignomaster' Vidal

Credits

Music - Existential dread (Call of the void), by Jean-Baptiste Amigo (check his work !!)
